QuestData.Title: Parachutes for the Argent Crusade
QuestData.Description: Those sky terrors are destroying my men and women! Dying from falling is a horrible way to go.$B$B$C, you have to get these parachutes out to them! At least then they'll have a fighting chance to survive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Falstaav at The Argent Stand has asked you to equip 10 Argent Crusaders or Argent Shieldmen out in the courtyard with parachutes.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you're back here talking to me why do I still see my people falling to their deaths?
QuestData.RewardText: You're a good $g man : woman;, $n. We're fortunate that you happened to stop by.$B$BStick around a while. I'm sure that we have much that a capable $c such as yourself can do.

Objectives.Objective: Argent forces equipped with a parachute
